category.name: Family Prayers
category.description: Prayers for family devotion and spiritual growth

content.text:
GOD, YOU'RE MORE THAN ENOUGH,

When I come into Your presence, I see
Your perfect glory,
Your throne that rules over everything, forever,
and the millions of angels who serve You.

Let the reality of Your greatness really sink in—
not to push me away from You,
but to inspire me to come closer;
not to crush my confidence in You,
but to lead me to be amazed that someone so great would reach down to me.

You have always been thinking of me and have been right there with me.
You've taken care of me since the day I was born,
looked out for me in every situation,
provided everything I need,
surrounded me with Your love,
and given me new grace every single morning.

Don't let me forget that I can look forward to even greater things—
a hope beyond death,
a down payment and a sneak peek of eternal life,
holiness, wisdom, strength, peace, and joy.
You've provided all these for me through Christ.

It breaks my heart to think how numb I've been
to Your authority in my life
and to the depth of Your love;
how little I have believed Your truth,
trusted Your promises,
taken Your warnings seriously,
obeyed Your commands,
made the most of the gifts You've given me,
welcomed Your guidance,
or responded to Your grace.

But even though I don't deserve it, I'm still here.

May Your goodness always lead me to turn back to You,
and may Your incredible patience with me be what saves me.
